entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
